name: Birth
short_description:
RELEASE SOON

We all have friends and family. But do you remember the birthday of everyone ? Not sure.
Birth is here to help you doing that !
All you have to do is download it and installing it.
After that, Birth will send you mails every time a birthday is coming !

Birth is a webapp based on PHP/Mysql. In order to install it, you must have a web server on which you could install it.
Birth need to send mails every day. So it need a SMTP server configured on PHP.
Moreover, it need to have access to a cron, in order to check birthays everytime. If you have a cron, all is perfect. If you don't have one, Birth could use a webcron, but Birth need to to accessible from the web !

Enjoy
summary: Birth is Birthday manager used to help people remember birthdays
